name: metixene
content: Metixene (brand names Methixart, CholinFall, Tremonil, Trest), also known as methixene, is an anticholinergic used as an antiparkinsonian agent. It has also been reported to induce incomplete autophagy and cell death in metastatic cancer and brain metastases.    == See also == 3-Quinuclidinyl thiochromane-4-carboxylate Dothiepin   == References ==
